ogj.com/2015/04/oil-production-starts-fr.snippet: Esso Exploration Angola (Block 15) Ltd., a subsidiary of ExxonMobil Corp., has started oil production ahead of schedule at the Kizomba Satellites Phase 2 project, 150 km offshore Angola in 1350 m of water.

phys.org/2015/04/what-can-we-do-with-unw.title: What can we do with unwanted satellites? -...
phys.org/2015/04/what-can-we-do-with-unw.snippet: There are thousands of satellites in Earth orbit, of varying age and usefulness. At some point they reach the end of their lives, at which point they become floating junk. What do we do with them then?

spaceflightnow.com/2015/04/photos-teleco.snippet: Look back on Sunday's launch of an Ariane 5 rocket from Europe's jungle spaceport in French Guiana with two communications satellites for a commercial Norwegian telecom operator and Franco-Italian military authorities.
